House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00871
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING A PROVINCIAL OFFICE OF THE GOVERNMENT SERVICE INSURANCE SYSTEM (GSIS) IN NAVAL, BILIRAN AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ESPINA, ROGELIO J. M.D.

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
